body:
Its time for another DISCUSSION STARTER! 

 Today's addition is about what games you all play on your phones! To kick things off I want to add something fun to every discussion starter. At the beginning of each DS, I'm going to say a random fun fact! Todays fact is: Did you know that sea otters hold hands when they sleep to keep from drifting apart? Anyways, time for the 3rd D.S! Todays question is: What games do you guys play on your phone/i pod/tablet? Are you really good at any of them? I thought of this idea because i want to create an avicus COC clan and thought, "hey I can make a D.S and discover who plays COC here!"
Hope you all enjoy today's discussion starter!

Peace out guys!

-C_P


p.s: D.S= discussion starte ^-^

title: Discussion starter #3 phone games

replies.body:
On my cell phone I have one game.
It's Spanish Doodle jump...I don't speak Spanish.

On my I-pod4 I have a number of games but I mostly play Minecraft PE on creative.
Very handy because I can play anywhere!

replies.body:
I love these discussion starters XD
I think there already is a COC clan for Avi :P
As for me I get on TinyTower, 2048 and social media.

replies.body: Umm. I play 2048, Piano Tiles, Magic Piano, social media, Geometry Dash, Pic Collage, FaceQ And a lot more that I don't want to list right now :3
replies.body_tagged: Umm. I play 2048, Piano Tiles, Magic Piano, social media, Geometry Dash, Pic Collage, FaceQ And a lot more that I don't want to list right now :3

replies.body: Dead Ninja: Mortal Shadow, Social Media, Plague Inc.
replies.body_tagged: Dead Ninja: Mortal Shadow, Social Media, Plague Inc.

replies.body: I don't have a phone (don't judge me), however when I get the chance I like/liked to play Fruit Ninja (I think everyone used to play that?), Battlefield 4 Commander (BF4 would have to be my second favorite game), and Clash of Clans (seems to be gaining popularity). But who has time for mobile games nowadays anyways? :D
